attributes.action: prevent the Norwich City Council from allowing the placement in Hay Hill, Norwich of a modern sculpture designed by Anne and Patrick Poirier.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Spending any taxpayers money on this hideous piece of questionable art and placing it in the heart of Norwich is an affront to the people of Norfolk.
It ugly, sad and likely to represent a health and safey risk to pedestrians. Norwich has a delightful city centre which has been mostly protected by the concrete excesses of post war modernist architects. This sort of "art" might work in Milton Keynes but is out of place in Norwich.
